## Preliminaries

Loading packages: 
```{r}

library(tidyverse)
library(tidymodels)
library(ggplot2)
library(haven)
library(here)
library(ipumsr)

```

Loading the data:
```{r}

#| output: false
#| warning: false
#| message: false

ddi <- read_ipums_ddi(here("data","nhis_00004.xml"))
full_data <- read_ipums_micro(ddi)

# Only keeping in the observations that have a non-null value for work loss days (WLDAYR)
work_loss <- full_data |>
  filter(WLDAYR < 996)

```
